hero.label: Solution
hero.title: Business Launch
hero.subtitle: Bring your product or company to market with a properly built digital foundation.

overview.label: What's Included
overview.title: Launch Package Contents
overview.description: A comprehensive approach to launching your digital business. Every step is designed to achieve results — your first customers and sales.

0.title: Niche Analytics
0.description: We research the market, competitors, and target audience to form a strategy
0.details: Deep dive into your niche: we analyze top-10 competitors, identify their strengths and weaknesses, study target audience through interviews and surveys. Output: positioning, USP, and go-to-market strategy.
0.deliverables: Competitor analysis, Customer personas, USP, Strategy

1.title: UX Architecture
1.description: We design user scenarios and information structure
1.details: We create a customer journey map from first touch to purchase. Design information architecture, wireframes, and interactive prototypes. Test with real users to optimize conversion.

2.title: UI Design
2.description: We create a visual style that sets you apart from competitors
2.details: We develop a unique brand visual language: color palette, typography, icons, illustrations. Create a design system and all page layouts with mobile adaptation.
2.deliverables: Design system, UI Kit, All layouts, Responsive

3.title: Development
3.description: We build websites or platforms using modern technologies
3.details: We use modern stack: Next.js, React, TypeScript. Optimize for SEO and Core Web Vitals. Integrate with CMS for easy content management. Connect necessary services and APIs.

4.title: Analytics
4.description: We connect analytics systems to track effectiveness
4.details: Set up Google Analytics 4, advertising pixels. Create dashboards to track key metrics: traffic, conversions, user behavior.

5.title: Marketing
5.description: We set up initial customer acquisition channels
5.details: Basic SEO optimization for organic traffic. Set up advertising accounts for Google Ads, Meta Ads. CRM integration for lead automation. Email marketing for audience nurturing.
5.deliverables: SEO on-page, Ad pixels, CRM, Email

6.title: Funnel
6.description: We build a sales funnel to convert visitors into customers
6.details: Design complete funnel: from acquisition to repeat sales. Create lead magnets, landing pages, email sequences. Set up retargeting to bring visitors back.
6.deliverables: Lead magnets, Landing pages, Email sequences, Retargeting

results.digital_presence: Complete digital presence from day one

hero.label: Solution
hero.title: Sales Growth
hero.subtitle: Increase conversion, reduce acquisition costs, and scale sales through funnel optimization.

overview.label: What's Included
overview.title: Growth Package Contents
overview.description: A comprehensive approach to increasing sales through optimization of every funnel stage. We analyze, test, implement — measurable results.

0.title: Funnel Audit
0.description: Complete analysis of your current sales funnel and identification of drop-off points
0.details: We conduct a deep audit of all funnel stages: from first touch to repeat sales. We analyze user behavior, identify bottlenecks, and determine growth potential at each stage.
0.deliverables: Funnel map, Drop-off report, Growth points, Priorities

1.title: A/B Testing
1.description: Systematic hypothesis testing to increase conversion
1.details: We form data-driven hypotheses and run A/B tests on key elements: headlines, CTAs, forms, landing pages. Statistically significant results for decision-making.
1.deliverables: Hypothesis bank, A/B tests, Statistics, Conclusions

2.title: CRO Optimization
2.description: Implementing changes to increase conversion at every stage
2.details: Based on test data, we implement changes: optimize UX, simplify forms, improve load speed, add social proof and urgency triggers.
2.deliverables: UX improvements, New forms, Social proof, Triggers

3.title: Behavior Analytics
3.description: Deep analytics of user actions on the website
3.details: We set up heatmaps, session recordings, form analytics. We understand how users interact with the site, where they drop off, and why they don't convert.
3.deliverables: Heatmaps, Session recordings, Form analysis, Insights

4.title: Performance Marketing
4.description: Optimizing ad campaigns to reduce CAC
4.details: Audit and optimization of ad accounts: we improve targeting, test creatives, optimize bids. We reduce customer acquisition cost while maintaining quality.
4.deliverables: Ad audit, New creatives, Bid optimization, Retargeting

5.title: Email Marketing
5.description: Automated sequences for nurturing and customer retention
5.details: We create automated email sequences: welcome series, abandoned carts, reactivation, upsell. Personalization based on user behavior.
5.deliverables: Welcome series, Abandoned cart, Reactivation, Upsell

6.title: Sales Automation
6.description: CRM implementation and sales process automation
6.details: We configure CRM for your processes: automatic lead distribution, manager reminders, automatic follow-ups. Integration with website and advertising systems.
6.deliverables: CRM setup, Lead automation, Follow-up, Integrations
